titles.title: To provide criminal penalties for providing false information in registering a domain name on the Internet.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: 5/2/2002--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to prohibit knowingly and with intent to defraud providing material and misleading false contact information to a domain name registrar, registry, or authority in registering a domain name as part of an electronic address on the Internet.
